entry.def: The dashboard in a car is the panel facing the driver's seat where most of the instruments and switches are.

means.word_mean: 1. protective covering consisting of a panel to protect people from the splashing water or mud etc.
2. instrument panel on an automobile or airplane containing dials and controls
